title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: crewel wool on cotton
Technique: uncounted stitches chain stitch [done with a needle] and knots and satin stitch on a 2/2 twill foundation
description: Piece of crewel embroidery colored yarns with scattered motifs in a grid arrangement.  The motifs do not repeat in a regular manner but alternate a floral motif (eight different ones, sometimes facing in different directions) with an animal or bird motif (eight different ones). Different colors are used when a motif is repeated.
name: Fragment
